p: Compared with the other viruses, all RLU averages of Fab 2A6 that reacted with HAdVs were high ( Fig 3). All RLU averages of Fab 2A6 that reacted with HAdVs in species B and E were higher than those of the Fab that reacted with those in species C and F, except HAdV-B35 ( Fig 3). A higher average RLU of Fab 2A6 that reacted with HAdV-E4 was found ( Fig 3). A similar result was found with Fab 4E2 ( Fig 3). However, the results showed that Fab 2A6 displays a higher RLU than Fab 4E2 under the same experimental conditions ( Fig 3).
